name: Serious Sandwiches: The Girl & the Fig's Pork Tartine
description: The perfect setting requires a serious sandwich, and The Girl & The Fig, in downtown Sonoma, California, serves it up in the form of the Pork Tartine. Pronounced "tarteen," the word is essentially French for anything delicious, layered on a...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except for sugar in a heavy bottomed sauce pot. Cook over medium heat until liquid has evaporated. Add sugar. Stir well. Remove to sheet tray; refrigerate to cool.
